hero.title: E-commerce Global Shipping
hero.description: Moogship helps Amazon, Etsy, Shopify, Walmart, and Wayfair sellers ship packages globally from Turkey with ease. Track in real-time and manage all shipping needs from one place.
hero.feature1Description: Easily manage marketplace orders with specialized shipping solutions.
hero.feature2Description: Seamlessly connect your Amazon, Etsy, Shopify, Walmart, and Wayfair stores.

hero.title: Lowest-Cost Global Shipping
hero.subtitle: We help US and European e-commerce sellers get the best possible shipping rates, saving you money on every package. No subscriptions, just the lowest fees in the industry.

tracking.title: Track Your Shipment
tracking.subtitle: Enter your tracking number below to get real-time updates on your package location and delivery status.

features.title: Powerful Features for Global Shipping
features.subtitle: Our platform combines advanced technology with logistics expertise to streamline your international shipping operations.

feature1.title: Global Shipping Management
feature1.description: Track and manage international shipments across 190+ countries with real-time updates and complete visibility throughout the delivery process.

feature2.title: Multi-Carrier Integration
feature2.description: Compare rates and services from leading global shipping providers to find the most cost-effective option for your international packages.

feature3.title: Automated Label Generation
feature3.description: Create and print compliant shipping labels with one click. Our system automatically generates all required documentation for customs clearance.

feature4.title: Recipient Management
feature4.description: Store and manage an unlimited number of recipients with detailed address verification and smart suggestions for faster data entry.

feature5.title: Product Catalog Management
feature5.description: Build and manage your product catalog with comprehensive details including SKUs, dimensions, weights, and customs information for faster shipping.

feature6.title: Multi-language Support
feature6.description: Use the platform in your preferred language with support for English, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, German, French, Arabic, and Spanish.

highlight.title: Comprehensive Dashboard
highlight.description: Get a bird's-eye view of all your shipping operations with our intuitive dashboard. Monitor shipment status, track expenses, and identify opportunities to optimize your logistics operations.
highlight.point2: Detailed cost analysis and savings reports

benefits.title: Why Choose MoogShip?
benefits.subtitle: Our platform was built to solve the complex challenges of international shipping and logistics management.

benefit1.title: Save Up to 70% on Shipping
benefit1.description: Access exclusive discounted rates from leading global carriers that traditional shipping platforms cannot match.
benefit1.item2: No monthly subscription fees or minimums
benefit1.item3: Transparent pricing with no hidden charges

benefit2.title: Ship to 190+ Countries
benefit2.description: Expand your business globally with our extensive carrier network and streamlined international shipping process.
benefit2.item3: Local pickup options in major countries

benefit3.title: Simplify Your Workflow
benefit3.description: Save time with our intuitive platform designed to make international shipping as easy as domestic.
benefit3.item3: Seamless integration with major e-commerce platforms

footer.description: Global shipping logistics platform for businesses of all sizes.

overview.description: Moogship empowers international businesses with intelligent shipment management, advanced pricing tools, and seamless multi-currency support.

guides.title: Quick Guides

firstShipment.title: Creating Your First Shipment
steps: Navigate to "New Shipment" in the sidebar
Fill in the sender and recipient information
Enter package details including weight and dimensions

balance.title: Managing Your Balance
steps: Go to "My Balance" in the sidebar
View your current balance and transaction history
Use the banking information to make deposits

tracking.title: Tracking Shipments
steps: Click on any shipment to see detailed status
Use the tracking number to get real-time updates

support.title: Getting Support
steps: Click "New Support Ticket" in the sidebar
Select a category for your issue
Submit the ticket and wait for our response
Check "My Tickets" to view responses and updates

questions.question: How do I check my shipment status?
questions.answer: Go to "Track Shipments" in the sidebar and select the shipment you want to track. You'll see detailed information about its current status and location.

questions.question: How can I add funds to my account?
questions.answer: Visit the "My Balance" page and use the banking information provided to make a bank transfer. Once your payment is processed, your balance will be updated.

questions.question: What shipping methods are available?
questions.answer: We offer various shipping methods including express, standard, and economy options. The available methods depend on your origin and destination countries.

questions.question: How long does shipping usually take?
questions.answer: Shipping times vary based on the method chosen and destination. Express shipments typically take 2-5 business days, while standard shipping can take 5-14 business days.

questions.question: What should I do if my shipment is delayed?
questions.answer: If your shipment is delayed, first check its status in the "Track Shipments" section. If the delay continues, create a support ticket and our team will assist you.

questions.question: Can I ship internationally?
questions.answer: Yes, Moogship specializes in international shipping. We support shipments to most countries worldwide with competitive rates and reliable delivery.

priceCalculator.title: Shipping Price Calculator
priceCalculator.subtitle: Get instant shipping quotes for your packages with our advanced pricing calculator
priceCalculator.enterPackageDetails: Enter package details to get an accurate shipping quote
priceCalculator.billableWeightDescription: Enter the billable weight directly to override automatic calculations. This is useful when you already know the billable weight from your carrier.
priceCalculator.billableWeightNote: Billable weight is the higher of actual weight and volumetric weight (LWH5000).
priceCalculator.girthExceeding: For shipments with a girth exceeding a certain measurement, carriers may apply additional charges. The calculation and applicable surcharges are as follows:
priceCalculator.girthCalculation: In international air shipping, girth is calculated as:
priceCalculator.girthFormula: [(sum of the two shorter sides) x 2] + the longest side
priceCalculator.upsRule1: If the girth is between 295 cm and 400 cm, the shipment will be billed as 48 kg and an additional $150 surcharge will be applied.
priceCalculator.upsRule2: If any side of your shipment exceeds 98 cm, an additional $21 surcharge applies.
priceCalculator.upsRule3: If two sides of your shipment are longer than 75 cm, an additional $21 surcharge applies.
priceCalculator.upsRule4: If the actual weight of your shipment exceeds 25 kg, an additional $21 surcharge applies.
priceCalculator.upsRule5: If the package exceeds 70 volumetric weight (desi), an additional $380 surcharge applies.
priceCalculator.upsRule6: If any single side of your package is longer than 270 cm, or if the girth exceeds 400 cm, an additional $380 surcharge applies.
priceCalculator.profitabilityCalculator: You can calculate the profitability of a shipment for major marketplaces from
priceCalculator.ecoServiceNote: Eco service is only valid for shipments to the USA weighing under 0.5 kg/desi.
priceCalculator.ecoFallbackNote: Shipments that do not qualify for Eco but are selected as Eco will be billed at standard rates by default.
priceCalculator.customsNote: Your shipments may not require customs clearance. Customs fees and duties are calculated based on the contents and value of your items, as well as the regulations of the destination country.
priceCalculator.selectBestOption: Select the shipping option that best fits your needs

steps.intro: Welcome to MoogShip! Let's take a comprehensive tour to help you navigate our global shipping platform efficiently.
steps.navigation: This is your main navigation menu. You can access all features of the platform from here, including shipment creation, tracking, and account management.
steps.dashboard: This is your personalized dashboard that provides a real-time overview of your shipping activities, recent transactions, and important announcements.
steps.createShipment: Click here to create a new shipment. You'll be able to enter sender and recipient information, package details, and choose shipping options.
steps.priceCalculator: Use our price calculator to estimate shipping costs before creating shipments. Enter package details and destinations to get accurate quotes.
steps.bulkUpload: For multiple shipments, use our bulk upload feature. You can import Excel files with multiple orders to create shipments in batch.
steps.trackShipments: Track all your approved shipments here. You can monitor their status, view detailed information, and download shipping labels and documentation.
steps.balance: Here you can view your current account balance. This shows the funds available for creating new shipments and managing your logistics needs.
steps.products: Manage your product catalog here. Creating product templates helps you quickly select accurate item details when creating shipments.
steps.supportTicket: Need help? Our support system allows you to create tickets, track responses, and get assistance from our customer service team.
steps.myTickets: View and manage your existing support tickets here. You can track the status of your inquiries and continue conversations with our support team.
steps.gettingStarted: Visit our Getting Started page anytime to access comprehensive guides, FAQs, and detailed instructions for using MoogShip's features.
steps.completion: That's it! You're now ready to use MoogShip's global shipping platform. Remember that you can restart this tutorial anytime from the Help section in the sidebar.

etsy.heroBanner: NEW: Etsy Integration - Automate your entire shipping workflow!
etsy.title: Supercharge Your Etsy Store with MoogShip
etsy.subtitle: Connect your Etsy store and automate your entire shipping workflow. Save time, reduce costs, and delight your customers with our powerful Etsy Integration.
etsy.feature1Desc: Automatically import all your Etsy orders with a single click. No manual data entry, no copy-paste errors.
etsy.feature2Desc: Process multiple orders at once. Set customs values, GTIP codes, and package dimensions in seconds.
etsy.feature3Desc: Get real-time shipping quotes for all your Etsy orders. Compare carriers and choose the best option.

priceCalculator.title: Shipping Price Calculator
priceCalculator.subtitle: Get instant shipping quotes for your packages with our advanced price calculator
priceCalculator.description: Get instant shipping rates for your international packages
priceCalculator.enterPackageDetails: Enter package details to get accurate shipping rates
priceCalculator.billableWeightDescription: Enter billable weight directly to override automatic calculations. This is useful when you already know the billable weight from the carrier.
priceCalculator.billableWeightNote: Billable weight is the higher of actual weight and volumetric weight (LWH5000).
priceCalculator.validationError: Please fill in all required fields
priceCalculator.girthExceeding: Shipments exceeding certain girth measurements may incur additional charges from carriers. Current calculations and applicable surcharges are:
priceCalculator.girthCalculation: For international air freight, girth is calculated as:
priceCalculator.girthFormula: [(sum of two short edges) x 2] + longest edge
priceCalculator.upsRule1: If girth is between 295 cm and 400 cm, shipment is billed as 48 kg with an additional $150 surcharge.
priceCalculator.upsRule2: If any dimension exceeds 98 cm, an additional $21 surcharge applies.
priceCalculator.upsRule3: If two dimensions exceed 75 cm, an additional $21 surcharge applies.
priceCalculator.upsRule4: If actual weight exceeds 25 kg, an additional $21 surcharge applies.
priceCalculator.upsRule5: If package exceeds 70 volumetric weight (desi), an additional $380 surcharge applies.
priceCalculator.upsRule6: If any dimension exceeds 270 cm or girth exceeds 400 cm, an additional $380 surcharge applies.
priceCalculator.profitabilityCalculator: Check shipment profitability for major marketplaces
priceCalculator.ecoServiceNote: Eco service is only valid for shipments under 0.5 kg/desi to the US.
priceCalculator.ecoFallbackNote: Shipments not eligible for Eco but selected as Eco will be billed at standard rates by default.
priceCalculator.customsNote: Your shipments may not be subject to customs procedures. Customs fees and taxes are calculated based on your items' content and value, and the destination country's regulations.
priceCalculator.selectBestOption: Select the shipping option that best fits your needs

weightInfo.billableWeightExplanation: Higher of actual or volumetric weight

options.title: Choose Your MoogShip Service
options.subtitle: Select the shipping option that best fits your needs

customsCalculator.title: US Customs Calculator
customsCalculator.subtitle: Calculate accurate US customs duties and taxes for your shipments
customsCalculator.description: This calculator uses official US government duty rates from the USITC database and includes current tariff rates. Calculations are for US destinations only.

form.hsCodeHelp: Enter the 6-10 digit Harmonized System code for your product
form.customsValueHelp: The declared value of your goods for customs purposes

results.title: Calculation Results
results.note: Note: These are estimates based on official US government rates. Final amounts may vary depending on customs valuation and other factors.
results.placeholder: Enter your product details to calculate customs duties
